<div class="HTAtable">

| Country    | Agency                                   | Available guidance from agency website | Source link | Additional guidance from conversations | Additional notes |
|:-----------|:-----------------------------------------|:---------------------------------------|:------------|:---------------------------------------|:-----------------|
| Australia  | Pharmaceutical Benefits Advisory Committee (PBAC) | States that TreeAge Pro and Excel 2010 are the only software that can be used without pre-arrangement<br><br> Requirements of submission: <br>    Access to the electronic copy of the evaluation <br>  - Ensure that variables can be changed independently<br>  - Can produce results within 'reasonable running times'| <a href = "https://pbac.pbs.gov.au/information/printable-version-of-guidelines.html">Link</a> <br>Version 5, dated September 2016 | Awaiting reply |   |
